resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106103</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106103</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202671</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Nightmares of Hieronymus Bosch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alpträume von Hieronymus Bosch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cauchemars de Hieronymus Bosch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nightmares de Hieronymus Bosch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Incubi di Hieronymus Bosch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εφιάλτες Hieronymus Bosch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pesadillas de Hieronymus Bosch</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">As part of a unit on Medieval Art, students will become familiar with some of the works of Hieronymus Bosch. They will identify symbols and imagery of fear and will be able to relate this to some of their own fears and nightmares.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Als Teil einer Maßeinheit auf mittelalterlicher 
kunst, werden Kursteilnehmer mit einigen der Arbeiten von Hieronymus 
Bosch vertraut. Sie kennzeichnen Symbole und Bilder von Furcht 
und können, dieses auf einigen ihrer eigenen Furcht und Alpträume in
Verbindung zu stehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En tant qu'élément d'une unité sur l'art 
médiéval, les étudiants se familiariseront avec certains des 
travaux de Hieronymus Bosch. Ils identifieront des symboles et 
le langage figuré de la crainte et pourront associer ceci à certains
de leurs propres craintes et cauchemars.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como a parte de uma unidade na arte medieval, os 
estudantes tornar-se-ão familiares com os alguns dos trabalhos de 
Hieronymus Bosch. Identificarão símbolos e imagery do medo e 
poderão  relacionar isto a alguns de seus próprios medos e 
nightmares.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come componente di un'unità sull'arte medioevale,
gli allievi diventeranno esperti con alcuni degli impianti di 
Hieronymus Bosch. Identificheranno i simboli ed il linguaggio 
figurato di timore e potranno collegare questo ad alcuni dei loro 
propri timori ed incubi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ως τμήμα μιας μονάδας στη μεσαιωνική τέχνη, οι 
σπουδαστές θα γίνουν εξοικειωμένοι με μερικές από τις εργασίες 
Hieronymus Bosch. Θα προσδιορίσουν τα σύμβολα και τα 
καλολογικά στοιχεία του φόβου και θα είναι σε θέση να αφορούν 
αυτό μερικούς από τους φόβους και τους εφιάλτες τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Como parte de una unidad en arte medieval, los 
estudiantes harán familiares con algunos de los trabajos de 
Hieronymus Bosch. Identificarán símbolos e imágenes del miedo
y podrán relacionar esto con algunas de sus propios miedos y 
pesadillas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
